website_summaries.verdict: A durable hard-top truck bed cover that fits well and folds all the way to the front of the bed.
pros: Three size options available to fit your truck bed
Allows you to fold back partially if you need to carry tall loads
cons: Don't expect a completely waterproof seal from this truck bed cover
it may have a tendency to leak over time

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using Bak products for years and each time I purchase one the quality control gets worse and worse. This time for my 2019 F150 the rails that hold the slam latch were attached so out of spec it damaged the rails attached to the truck before I realized what the issue was. This thing costs almost $1000 so don’t expect that kind of poor quality. At this point I had already installed everything on my truck and this thing is too bulky to try and repack to return. Now I have damaged rails that look like crap, a cover that I had to rework to get it to work, and have lost all faith in BAK all together.
customer_reviews.author: CitizenMTB

customer_reviews.title: So far, great product and experience
customer_reviews.text: Order from Amazon came 3 days sooner than expected, and a week sooner than some of the online truck accessory retailers advertised. Installation was straightforward without any problems. This is a big deal to me, I am not mechanically inclined, and something always seems to go wrong. But the instructions were clear, and all the parts were included and fit as described. I like the way this looks and operates so far. We'll be taking our truck on a road trip next week and that will be the true test. I'll update this review if something unexpected happens or it fails in some way. But for now, 5 stars all around.
customer_reviews.author: C. M Turner

customer_reviews.title: Really want to like it more...
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install and looks great. Was able to install it by myself with no issues. It has worked well the last two months. Quickly became evident that the corners do not adhere completely. Two of the four were actually sealed, but the other two were separating upon arrival; you can see the adhesive smudges all around but they don't hold. I attempted to contact customer support with no luck. I also attempted to establish the warranty through the website but never received any return correspondence.
customer_reviews.author: Ben&Ash

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase, no buyers remorse.
customer_reviews.text: There is a video on youtube from the factory on how to install this that will walk you through it step by step. It took me about 30-minutes to fully install and adjust it. I was not sure it would be rain proof but it is, we had a bunch of rain over the last 30-days and there is no water in my bed. It flips up and down very easily with latch at each section. I am not sure I would stand on it and feel good about it but my kids walked on it and seem to hold up well. I would absolutely buy this again, it turned my bed into a secure rain-tight trunk.
customer_reviews.author: ITO

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe, leaked, defects
customer_reviews.text: I was not happy with this at all. It leaked on both sides of the rails. Took me a while to fix the weather strip that rests inside the bed rail and the rubber going down both sides was wavy. However, the biggest problem was that one of the folds was missing a latch to lock it. Custom service was quick and nice. I got a new lock but had no instructions on how to install it. I returned it!!
customer_reviews.author: QualityOverAnything

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation.
customer_reviews.text: Installation is easy, I did it by myself with no help. Overall, I'm happy with the cover but the manufacturer needs to find a different glue as the weatherstripping on three of the four cover's corners separated. I sent the manufacturing email asking what glue they used as I wanted to avoid it when I reglued the weatherstripping but they never responded to my query.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Great Truck Bed Cover, Poor Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: The BakFlip installed quickly and easily. I really like how it works and how tough it is. So why only 3 stars? After two years, one of the latch bars just fell off. It was supposed to be riveted on, but there were no rivets. It was just stuck on with a sticky strip. I contacted customer support since it had a 5 year warranty. Customer support was slow, but finally sent me a new latch bar. It took me a while to install it myself; instructions were poor. I have no idea if rivets have been left off of the other latch bars.
customer_reviews.author: Scooter

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product - easy installation
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these on my Silverado and it worked out great, so I purchased and installed the MX 4 on my 2019 Ford F-150 Supercrew, Lariat. The product is well made and easy to install. It was packaged very well when received and all the components were in the package. Watching the short install video really helps with the actual install. My only request with this product is that they should supply (4) brackets for each rail, vs. the (3) which the company supplies. Installating the rail brackets 6" - 9" from the tailgate end, leaves a little bit of flex when opening/closing the roll top. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Kunihiro

customer_reviews.title: Would be a great buy for half the price...
customer_reviews.text: I've had 3 different tonneau covers in the last 10 years or so and this by far was the most expensive and somehow yet the least resistant to the elements. Significant amount of water leakage in heavy rains, and glued corner seams are pulling up within just 2 months of use. Not really the durability you would expect from the "leading" industry brand...That being said there is a lot to love about this cover such as bed security when closed and general ease of installation and operational features. Just wish they spent a bit more time at the factory to tighten it all up and match the price point. Pretty sure I will be switching brands. Good luck
customer_reviews.author: lokoshimi

customer_reviews.title: Bad Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: The packaging the item came in was not damaged. Therefore, the issues I have with the product did not happen in shipment. The joints were out of place causing the cover to not even come close to being able to seat. I got it all into place and the thing leaks all over the place. I expected some leakage up near the cab of the truck as the bed liner does not go all the say across, but this thing leaks at the joints as well. If I had it to do over, I would not purchase this product. What on earth has happened to quality control and craftsmanship? This item should have never left the production floor...
customer_reviews.author: Kenny G

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!  Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Nice bed cover. Very versatile and looks great. Low profile so accents the truck well. Easy to install with some minor design issues to work around. But not a big deal once installed. Time will tell th durability. However with the frame and panels being aluminum, should last the trucks lifetime. We’ll see about the finish over time. Expect it will last. Overall, a very nice cover. Easy to operate, open and close. Happy with the end result. Did they say it looks great?!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Backflip MX4 Hard Cover
customer_reviews.text: Installed on a 2019 F-150. Took about an hour. Installed over a new drop in bed liner. Looks good. Only dislike is where the tailgate slides under the back of the cover. It seems the rubber seal / sweep should set further back. As it is the back looks like it has a gap but it cannot be adjusted. Still looks nice though. I read the bad reviews about packing and scratches but did not have that problem. It was foam packed with no scratches / defects.
customer_reviews.author: BDC

customer_reviews.title: Awful Internal Packaging
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived on time and outside packaging via FedEx was good. Once the box was opened I noticed the clips were free from there plastic wrap packaging. One (of six) was missing. Continued to install the cover and when lifting the folding top panels onto the side rails , the missing clip fell out. It was sandwiched between the panels and dented the top facing aluminum. $900+ tonneau cover that skimped out on that clip packaging allowing it to damage the panels. Other reviews have similar issues. The clips are metal with sharp corners and they are wrapped in cheap plastic shrink wrap that is very brittle. In hindsight I would have bought from a local dealer.
customer_reviews.author: willydigger

customer_reviews.title: sturdy hardware. Installation took about 60 minutes total
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in 2 days via Fedex. High quality product. Aluminum frame, high quality plastic, sturdy hardware. Installation took about 60 minutes total. I did it myself but an extra set of hands would be helpful. Looks fantastic on the truck, and the seal is uniform and water tight with the installed drain hoses. Easy to open from both sides. Absolutely love it. The flush look is great as well. Worth every penny. Previously had a Bak F1 on my 2012 F150. This one is installed on a 2016 F150.
customer_reviews.author: Ted L

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!  Packaging could use some work though
customer_reviews.text: The packaging could use a bit of work - mine arrived with some small dents and a few scratches, but they are in places where they won’t be seen so I wasn’t concerned enough to go through a return. This product installs fairly easily, but you do have to drill the plastic plugs in your truck bed for the drains, which was nerve wracking on my brand new truck. If you have the ford-installed spray in bed liner, it helps to pop the plugs out and just take off the Spray, it will come off when you drill anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew B.

customer_reviews.title: Good if you get one that works
customer_reviews.text: First one did not close on the second panel correctly. Spent a good amount of time adjusting it but it still would not properly close without force. It was a huge pain to remove it all and take it back to the post office. Second cover did not have this problem. Had the same cover on a 2016 F150 and it performed well and seemed to hold up well. The matte finish on the mx4 holds up much better over time compared to the gloss.
customer_reviews.author: Brent H

customer_reviews.title: Great look and quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a new to me 2017 F150 Platinum with a TonnoMax an as cover that was for the old body style amd leaked badly. My old F150 had a Lund Tri old that held up well but was always flapping on the highway. This cover is easy to install, solid on the highway and looks great. The only downside is that the last fold doesn’t rest on the cab body but the glass and won’t allow the support struts to fit in their brackets.
customer_reviews.author: HPvet

customer_reviews.title: You get what's promised, and great cover at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: After researching bed covers heavily I went with the BakFlip MX4. One person install in less than 30 minutes, great fit and finish and although not water proof after a couple heavy down pours only a drip here and there. Just be sure to check and clean out the aluminum shavings from the pre drilled holes and your fasteners will drop in easy, my only complaint and that being nitpicky. One of the slickest looking bedcover on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Great Product so far
customer_reviews.text: I have had this top for 5 months. So far its a great product and would recommend this to anyone. It does not leak when in the rain. It will leak just a little bit in the back corner when the truck gores thru the car wash. I believe that the air blower pushes water thru the rear seal corner but so far not a problem. The slide Lock rod supports fall out of the holder when you let the sections down but I took a small piece of tie wire and it holds in place fine
customer_reviews.author: Bob S

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service is beyond bad, lets say absent.
customer_reviews.text: This product shows up in a damaged package. I installed it, looked good initially out of the box but the corner piece was broken off, there was missing hardware. Call Backflip and you will wait hours (still no answer), use the contact them via the website and NO response 2 weeks later, and email them directly, NO response. Horrible. If it shows up intact and you don't need help. It's pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: This is the one you want!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I purchased this same item 6 years ago for my 2011 F-150 and used it heavily in a commercial environment and it held up very well. This new design for my 2017 F-150 is just as easy to install (1 hour), lighter and slightly thinner than the previous model. Very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Not as nice as they used to be.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second back flip and this one is far inferior to the first that was bought years ago from another source. The pull cables are not fully secured in the track and they get stuck up in the channel so you can’t get your finger under it due to the lack of parts present in the photos on the manufacturers website. It leaks and it also has done nothing for fuel mileage yet. In my honest opinion it seems like I got sold factory seconds.
customer_reviews.author: EMcDee

customer_reviews.title: dented, missing parts, they are holding my refund
customer_reviews.text: Damaged, looked like it was repackaged. missing some rail clamps, 2 dents on surface; box looked good except there was a,lot of tape. Some hardware missing and some just loose in the box. yes it wasted a lot of time. This would have been my 3rd bak flip . But now I am done with them Its now been 7 days since they received the cover back. Where is my money??
customer_reviews.author: R S L

customer_reviews.title: Looks Nice, But SUPER Fragile
customer_reviews.text: The outer covering is aluminum on both sides of the panels. These look great, but they are extremely fragile. I had a small stick (about the length and diameter of a ink pen) fall out of a tree and land on the cover. It punched holes completely through the aluminum. Any little thing will dent it. It is about the same thickness as the Heavy Duty aluminum foil that you buy in the grocery store. Seriously. Also, all you need is a piece of wire or coat hanger to slip into the slot above the tail gate and you can pop this right open. Not very secure.
customer_reviews.author: SJR

customer_reviews.title: Tonneau cover
customer_reviews.text: Really like this cover. Looks great and seems really durable. Easy to install. The only issues I have with it are the water seals are not great. I had to go buy more deals from lowes to make it better. Also one of the latch systems was installed wrong and once it latched together you could not take it off. Fortunately I was able to fix it. But for $850 i should not have to fix it and go buy more weather stripping. All in all it ain't a bad cover. The with strip needs to come over the tailgate a little more and I had to add more strip where the bed meets the cab.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Cover up your bed
customer_reviews.text: Installed for my father in law. Mounted up easy. He is having trouble with the clamps coming loose. Gonna use lock tight on the bolts Looks really nice, but is not 100% water tight. The only wet spot is by the tailgate. So pretty good really. Rest of the bed is dry. This is an item that you get what you pay for. High quality, and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: TBonz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Marvelous design and execution Flawless installation. Now my bed will be protected from rain, snow, ice,leaves, errant garbage and the occasional vandal. But remember it's an aluminum outer with Styrofoam interior, of course they'll say polystyrene to fool you. And it was on sale for about $800 They packaged the product with ample protection so it arrived without any damage.
customer_reviews.author: JmC

customer_reviews.title: Great look but does leak 2016 F150 supercrew
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and looks great, but break out the silicone. I have a factory bed liner and the seal after two weeks of sitting in the sun still leaks. The rubber seal on the tri-folds keeps lifting so water gets in there too. I will contact the manufacturer to see what they say and post again, but for now a solid 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Randy G

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and works great
customer_reviews.text: Seems well built. Install was easy. Works great and looks great. Did have to modify my bedliner at the cab. Just had to notch out approximately a square inch. So side rails would seat better. If not, the bedliner would have held pressure on rail, not allowing it all the way forward. No big deal, just used a Dremel, took a few minutes. Will inform at later date of water tightness (looks as though they did a good job of making it as water tight as possible) and if any issues occur.
customer_reviews.author: Tool

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover for my 2018 raptor
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it is better than not having a cover at all. I went with this cover because I wanted a flush, sporty look to my truck. I don't like the whole leather flapping in the back thing. Was able to keep my truck bed dry in heaven rain while driving, but when it is parked and allows water to sit on top then you do get some leaks I'm assuming from the folds.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: MX4 Tonneau Cover
customer_reviews.text: Installed it myself today, took little over an hour. Easy to follow instructions, very simple process had a friend help. Well as soon as I was finished it started pouring down rain. Fits snug, seals water from top. I have to add a tailgate real to fill the gap to keep the water from spraying in from tailgate. Very nice addition to my truck.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Beaven

customer_reviews.title: Bak Flip G2 is Awesome; Worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: This cover is very nice. It was easy to install with the instructions on YouTube. It rained for 3 straight days w/o a drop getting in the bed. It has a nice low profile that barely rises above the top of the bed. The design is great and appears to be very secure. I love that I don’t sacrifice any of my bed as the cover folds completely up and out of the way. I got it in “Like New” condition for $130 off the normal price. Indistinguishable from New to Like New. I’m very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Misterdap

customer_reviews.title: Secure and dry
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Bakflip G2 that I have bought, as I also had one on my old truck. When it is closed and the tailgate is locked, it is very difficult to open. The bed and contents stay dry, as well. It only takes about an hour or less to install and it is quite easy to do so. I also get a lot of questions from other truck owners who notice it, and I have no reservations about highly recommending it.
customer_reviews.author: Roger R. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second of these. Lost the first when someone decided to turn left in front of me and totaled my truck. It had lasted through 2 years in Louisiana then 4 years in Montana and was still going strong to the end. So it was without hesitation that I got a new one for my new truck. This new one installed easily and looks sharp and secures the bed of my truck as well as can be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: We love this truck cover. No water leaks and the opening latch is on the inside— so no extra keys required (when truck bed is closed/locked, you cannot open the cover). Super easy to install and also fold out of the way when necessary. This has been a total game changer with how we can transport stuff in the truck- highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: impressed so far
customer_reviews.text: This just arrived a couple of hours ago. The carton was lightly crushed on one corner, but the contents were fine. There were no scratches or missing/broken parts. One pleasant surprise was the rail clips and bolts which appear to be black anodized vs. silver as I saw in all the videos. The packing materials were useful as soft, temporary bed liners while installing it. Installation was not difficult but forethought a care are important. No idea yet on just how watertight it will be.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Best Truck Accessory
customer_reviews.text: I had a bed cover for my 2015 that I absolutely loved. I kept tools in the back of my truck and would throw in camping gear and never had to worry about water damage. I live in Seattle so it has been important keep valuables dry. That bed cover lasted me 5 years. Now with a new truck I decided to stay with BakFlip. I need a cover that I can open almost every day, keep my stuff safe and dry, and hold up and not fall apart after only a couple of years. This product delivers!
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Nice. Still have the wimpy plastic hooks to hold ...
customer_reviews.text: My second truck with BAK cover. Improvements on the cover I purchased in Nov. 2016, each segment has a latch and the built in tie down strap eliminates the need for bungee cords. Nice. Still have the wimpy plastic hooks to hold the support bars..but this is a minor issue.
customer_reviews.author: Paul R Warren

customer_reviews.title: Delicate but good otherwise.
customer_reviews.text: The cover looks good. It fits perfectly. Don't expect it to last much though if you put any stress on it. Hail Will chew it up. Putting boxes on it will catch it easily. Very delicate.
customer_reviews.author: Argenis Bilbao

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend F1
customer_reviews.text: This review is about F1 not mx4 , I was shipped the wrong item. F1 has a great look to it , after getting it installed I didnt have any kind of leaks it gives full protection and security to the bed of the truck . Yes if someone really wanted to break in to the bed of the truck they can snap off the cover after multiple pulls but by then the alarm would go off and they would fail.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio A.

customer_reviews.title: Best truck bed cover on the market IMO
customer_reviews.text: Best truck bed cover on the market IMO. My company has a fleet of 6 F150's and we have put a BAKFlip G2 cover on every one of them. They are durable and strong and always fit perfectly. Because of this, I purchased this one for my own F150. I installed it on my truck in my driveway with standard tools most households have lying around. It took me about an hour from start to finish. Instructions are pretty straight forward.
customer_reviews.author: Craig V

customer_reviews.title: Missing installation parts
customer_reviews.text: Missing parts so I can't install it. Hoping I'll hear from the mfg.
customer_reviews.author: DLNinCA

customer_reviews.title: Truck Bed Cover
customer_reviews.text: Truck bed cover was packed excellent Product arrived early which was great ( packed very well) Cover took less than 2 hr to put on Fit well and works well. One note! The instructions come for a no bed liner. ? It fit perfect on my bed liner no problems It was confusing at 1st and we disregard it. Followed the install worked well
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit
customer_reviews.text: The cover fits the truck well, the packing could have been better, there was a broken clip that holds the prop rod when not used, I have contacted the manufacturer we will see if they replace the broken part. Other than that it was easy to install, and looks good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The mx4 has the distinct advantage of allowing the tailgate ...
customer_reviews.text: The mx4 has the distinct advantage of allowing the tailgate to open and close without opening the cover, making it almost the only choice for new f150s with automatic tailgate opening.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob A Noe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with my purchase. I was able to install it in a couple of hours, by myself. It would have been quicker, but I tried to install the rails upside down. I tend to not look at instructions to carefully. It is very secure, and rarely lets any water in, even after a car wash.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Costello

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in quality control
customer_reviews.text: Overall the cover looks good. However, as stated in other reviews, the quality control is not good. I received mine with unfinished drilling holes for the latches. Not only that, but one of the main holes to secure the cover with the rails was drilled crookedly at an angle. This made lining up the cover with the rails extremely difficult. My cover does not close properly on the last foldable panel unless I adjust and press down on both sides.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: May not fit tight
customer_reviews.text: The install went pretty easy however the cover does leak and one of the latches underneath came broken. I'm going to contact the company to.see if they will ship out replacement part and give advise one the leaking, I think the rail need to be shimed in a bit closer together to get a better water tight fit. Will review on my experience on deali.g with company
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Did It All By Myself
customer_reviews.text: I had the MX3 on my previous truck and loved the way this looks on my bed. Very easy to use. They upgraded the stem retainers however the surface seems to ding easier. Still love it, but I have a feeling this one may not last as long.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Wong

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy install and perfect fit for my 2016 Crew cap F150 5.6 bed FX4 truck. Looks very nice and is a really nice great quality flip up type top for the money. Took me 25 min to install and was very easy. Fits flush inside th bed and tailgate opens independently of the top. Not 100% water tight but that's fine only a little water gets in around the tailgate area. No biggie. 5 starts!
customer_reviews.author: Les

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install!
customer_reviews.text: Installed on my 2019 F-150. Received via UPS quickly and everything to install was included, no missing parts, instructions were easy to follow but I suggest watching the YouTube video from BAK. Had it on in about an hour (as usual, took me a few times to get everything lined up correctly, and when you don't follow the instructions you occasionally have to go back and undo something...). Great buy, product is performing as advertised and expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the security !
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a cover for the truck bed to protect our items when traveling. We are very pleased w/ this cover and have tested it is car washes and heavy rain storms. No more worrying about theft or vandalism. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: grannyb

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Very solid cover. Easy to install and easy to use. The only downside to this MX cover is the water resistance. It leaks small of amounts of water along the bedside, not in the middle of the truck bed. Very minimal though. It shines in other areas as far as install, and quality which makes the small water leak not an issue for me. As long as your items aren’t pushed up against the bedside you’re good.
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect
customer_reviews.text: I opted to buy the used one since it was almost $200 cheaper then new, but it arrived packaged nicely, with everything included. Small issue i had was it wasnt locking correctly which is probably why it was returned, but it was an easy fix. Just needed some adjustments. Took me about 45 min, including the adjustments.
customer_reviews.author: Yevgeniy Kistol

customer_reviews.title: Great product with top notch customer support
customer_reviews.text: Great product with top notch customer support. When I initially installed this on my 2008 F-150, it just didn’t seem to fit right, so I called BakFlip (Amazon gave me their number). BakFlip was super helpful in troubleshooting, and it came down to the fact that the shims needed for my particular vehicle hadn’t been installed at the factory. With no questions asked, BakFlip shipped me out enough shims to install three of these covers! The shims went on easy and the cover fits like a glove now. Very happy with the product, Amazon’s customer support, and BakFlips customer support. Well done!
customer_reviews.author: Shoba

customer_reviews.title: Extremely easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This has got to be the easiest yet most durable tonneau cover out there! Took under 40 minutes to fully install and secure on my F-150. I have multiple friends and relatives with a BAKFlip hard folding cover and have only heard good reviews. While I just installed the cover and haven't put to full use yet, I am confident it will perform as expected and hold it's quality for a long time to come. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my G2 yesterday and installed it right away. I’m fully satisfied with the cover and didn’t have any issues installing it by myself. A little pricey yes bud the quality is there for sure. Considering there were some bad reviews I rolled the dice and bought it anyway due to the low profile design. Packaging was on point and shipping so fast it came a day early. I don’t normally write reviews but this product deserves one. Couldn’t be happier
customer_reviews.author: Reshard Saladin

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't protect against elements at all
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of this cover but the functionality is not there at all. I have water leak into my truck bed every time it rains. The fact that it is low profile and can handle a considerable amount of weight on it are useless if it doesn't protect the items inside the truck bed.
customer_reviews.author: kittycat5

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, was easy to install. There was one piece broken on a retention buckle which the manufacturer replaced without question at no charge and it was to me in 3 days. This manufacturer understands the value of excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Ron Langenheder

customer_reviews.title: Package came damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Our BakFlip came danaged. The rail on the drivers side was very bent. Not able to install.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Bak-Flip
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd one I have used on my F150's. Love the total enclosed fit and ability to load tall objects in bed of truck. pop-up lids did not do this for me. Keep my golf clubs back there and they are always dry and secure (tail gate locks) and you can't open cover unless you open tail gate first.
customer_reviews.author: W. Kessinger

customer_reviews.title: Just installed.  Looks & fits great
customer_reviews.text: Just installed yesterday. It arrived in perfect condition and the install, that took almost an hour, was easy and straight forward. Very happy and I will update if it's longevity is not as expected.
customer_reviews.author: cdodgela

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMENDED FOR 2017 F-150!
customer_reviews.text: This cover is OFF THE CHARTS GOOD!! I'm in Lake Tahoe and haven't had a big snow yet, but we've got some good rain and this cover will keep the bed DRY! Functionality & performance are unmatched with this MX4 cover! Installation was supeer easy!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle T.

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, after watching the installation video on youtube a few times, I was able to install this myself with ease. Looks good and I hope to use it for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: F150, Easy to install and fits great!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly on my 2018 F150 with 5.5ft bed and easy to install; took me about an hour to put it on by myself. The directions were simple and straight forward. Recommend viewing the YouTube installation video beforehand. Snug fit and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: gregory s tennant

customer_reviews.title: Trade offs to having the low profile
customer_reviews.text: The company is trying to work through the problem. It is a high dollar product that leaks more than the cheap roll cover I had. I THINK the issue is that to get the low profile, water has to flow into the water channel in the rail system. When the water is too great (not a lot) or rushes toward the cab it overruns the cap at the end of the rail. The water has no other place to go but the bed.
customer_reviews.author: CLW

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra money
customer_reviews.text: Quality product, easy to install if you follow directions. I love how it sits flush with the truck bed. Most bed covers range from $200-$400, this is a little more but worth it. Plus if you have a locking tailgate, it would be very difficult to get in the truck bed, so it great for security
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Bad fabrication but fuctional good looking cover
customer_reviews.text: If this product was sold for $600 I would give it 4 stars. The first issue was some of the factory drilled holes were of terrible quality. We're the drill chuck had rammed into the part and dented it. Also one of the factory drilled holes did not align with other holes. Front dirt bike tire won't fit in the fully open position. In does feel pretty sturdy when installed. I really like the way it looks.
customer_reviews.author: chopper

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: Legit and very sturdy. Leaks a little at the back. Not sure why. Didn’t have to use the seal strip because I have a bedliner. Overall, very happy! Looks great too.
customer_reviews.author: fishyfish

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition to Any Truck
customer_reviews.text: This tonneau cover does not disappoint. Installation was easy - it definitely would be easier with two people for getting the cover into place. This cover provides the security that I was looking for AND with a great sleek look. What would be nice is to include a few zip ties to hold the drain tube in place and maybe a couple of grommets for the area after your drill the hole for the drain tube to exit. Looking forward to seeing how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: P-Lo

customer_reviews.title: Looks and fits like it was made for our truck
customer_reviews.text: This tonneau is a nice product and fits nicely on our 2019 F-150. We like the low profile which is nearly flush with the truck's sidewalls. One very minor problem is that the clips to retain the prop rods are very light duty and one broke at installation. I mentioned this to Bak when registering it but haven't heard from them. After a trip to a wet PNW with it, we're very pleased with it and would recommend it over the other brands we've seen installed.
customer_reviews.author: R.

customer_reviews.title: Its under 1000 bucks
customer_reviews.text: Awesome cover! Easy to install, fits, looks really good, and now the bed is secure. Its the perfect solution. Great price! I’ve had hard tonneau covers, and campers, and once their installed you really lose the use of the bed for dirtbikes, gear, and anything taller than the cab, I should of got this thing years ago. Went straight to the car wash, all my gear and tools in the back, no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel O. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Did a lot of research on these covers. Narrowed it down to this one. Saw some bad reviews and got a little worried but went ahead and took a leap. Really satisfied that I did. Cover fit great, seals great. Packaging was solid. (Looks like they listened to previous reviews) I did halve to cut in to my bed liner a tad as directed but it worked out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Cover
customer_reviews.text: Great Tonneau cover, easy to install. Bed stayed dry in hard rains.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Herington

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed and eazy to install
customer_reviews.text: Received in a timely manner, was eazy to install and is very well constructed. I would recommend this BAK BAKflip MX4 truck bed cover. I give it a tripleA+
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Bakflip MX4 tonneau cover 2018 F150 short bed
customer_reviews.text: Used this on my 2018 F150 XLT 5.6 bed. It is very nice. The install was real easy. I had one latch that was no opening all the way, I watched a YouTube video on how to adjust the latch but had to re drill the holes. Overall great. I will see how this holds up over time.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L. Weiner

customer_reviews.title: Material and Constrtuction.
customer_reviews.text: The ease of installation was not over stated. It was easy and I only needed a small helping hand. The Material and the way this cover is Constructed is very impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Still working out water issue. While be it I went through a car wash. We have been in a drought so no regular water sources have been tested other than car wash. Will update if anything changes. I would like to see some sort of ability to secure it after flipping it once back where it opens up right near the tailgate.
customer_reviews.author: Matt H.

customer_reviews.title: Relatively easy installation
customer_reviews.text: This was a two person installation. The drip hose is pretty flimsy. When trying to open the section closest to the cab, the release would not completely cleat the edge. I filed down the plastic latch to fit my truck bed and it worked fine after that. Overall, I'm very satisfied. Comparing it to an Undercover which was similar, I like this one better. It has a better fit on the tailgate.
customer_reviews.author: james tarver

customer_reviews.title: easy to install
customer_reviews.text: easy to install, I have not seen any leaks yet. really a solid cover and secures your bed with a locking tailgate. Installed on my 15 limited with auto tailgate and love the fact no need to open the cover to get in/out of the bed.
customer_reviews.author: michael h

customer_reviews.title: Tri-fold cover
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Easy to install. However I do recommend having 2 people when placing the tri-fold cover onto the rails.
customer_reviews.author: Jacksh

customer_reviews.title: Fits a 2010 XLT F-150 Great.
customer_reviews.text: I truly like this cover but the one issue I have is the sealing gasket at the front. I couldn’t get the gasket to stay on right and the cover doesn’t tighten down on it well at all. Other than that I have no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Sheable

customer_reviews.title: Good top
customer_reviews.text: I love the product but on one side the rubber isn’t siting flush it has a wrinkle...instructions said it would level off after awhile but hasn’t yet
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kenworthy

customer_reviews.title: Some adjustments needed, great looking cover!
customer_reviews.text: My ford 2019 F-150 has a drop-in bedliner, because it's not a snug fit, the rails don't fit, so you have modify the liner. I cut out around the drip hose, and attached the rails, I have a leak by the cab and will probably have to readjust the brackets by the bed for a better fit. But overall I love the look, and fit of the cover.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonBuyer12

customer_reviews.title: F150 game changer
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for our Colorado family trip. It helped protect luggage and camping supplies during the varying weather we experienced over the 10days we were traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Clark

customer_reviews.title: fit my 2018 F-150 5'5" bed perfectly
customer_reviews.text: the only thing that needs improvement is the 2 bolts in the front that secure the cover to the rails could be improved. They work but the bracket plate is not up to par with the rest of the cover.
customer_reviews.author: brad b

customer_reviews.title: It's ok.
customer_reviews.text: Some of the pieces inside, once installed, already broke. We purchased this 2-3 months ago, so that's disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Quick install
customer_reviews.text: Pretty simple installation, took me about 30 minutes with out any help. Good quality, glad i didn't go with one of the cheaper import one I would looking at originally.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Trask

customer_reviews.title: Broken latch
customer_reviews.text: This product came with a broken latch. We had to take the latch apart to find that h Th e cable was disconnected from the latch itself causing the mechanism to it work at all. After fixing once, after 1 or 2 uses that latch is now disconnected again. The major problem is we had to fully install to find out that the latch was broken.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Davis

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit
customer_reviews.text: Product seemed to be really well made but it did not fit correctly. Amazon said it should fit my truck but it would seal in most places but not all. Not sure if I just got a faulty one but I don't know if I want to go through the process of buying another one online. Return process has been extremely easy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Reeder

customer_reviews.title: love it on my 2016 F150
customer_reviews.text: It came new and in good condition. All parts we're there and it works as advertised. I installed it myself easily and would recommend to others. I like this better then the original g2 because it is thicker and just feels more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: jw

customer_reviews.title: Good One
customer_reviews.text: Installation was as expected...a little more tricky with Bed Rug. Been thru one wash and one rain, no noticeable leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: THE MX4 is easy to install, great way to secure items in the bed of your truck, and not bad on the eyes. I would definitely recommend product to everybody. Had a slight issue with certain pieces showing up cracked, but the customers support completely made up for the issues. Great product and excellent customer service at BAK.
customer_reviews.author: M. Quintana

customer_reviews.title: The rails come damaged/ bent
customer_reviews.text: As all the reviews state both rails come bent on the ends, it’s a shame for all that money for this cover, quality control is very poor, need to fire some employees........
customer_reviews.author: Salvatore Comparetto

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit perfect match.
customer_reviews.text: It fit perfectly with no modifications. Took about an hour to install. The only downside I have found is you have to close the tailgate before you close the cover. It keeps the stuff in your bed dry and secure. I've had no problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: Rich P

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged.
customer_reviews.text: The BakFlip G4 arrived damaged. The box looked OK so I think it was a manufacturing issue. The support bracket for the arm that holds it open was bent and the rivets were torn out. Also there was a tear in the rubber seal along the rail. I fixed the rivets. And hopefully I can get a new seal for the top rail. I do like the way the cover works and the install was easy except for finding my my rivet tool.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Berry

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great truck bed cover. I received it super fast with free shipping - ordered on a Sunday and received on Tuesday! It took maybe 30 minutes to install. It fits perfectly and looks great! It has already been rain tested and came through without a drop inside! Already had many positive comments on the look of it. I love it and will recommend to all of my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have a small business hauling parts and this has really helped protect them from any bad weather. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Chester Sisco

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, easy install, not 100% waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look and function of the BAK BAKFlip MX4. It was very easy to install myself. The only downside which I expected and read about any folding bed cover is that some water gets in but it is minimal and doesn't seem like it will be an issue. I made some slight adjustments hoping to minimize the water getting in even more but haven't had a rain since then so we'll see.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and functionality
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical since it was on sale, but this thing is really heavy duty. Very impressed with the quality and functionality. It isn’t completely water proof but overall top notch.
customer_reviews.author: JM

product_meta.title: BAK BAKFlip G2 Hard Folding Truck Bed Tonneau Cover | 226327 | Fits 2015-20 Ford F150 6'6" Bed
product_meta.description: Size:6' 6" Bed| Style:2015 - 2020| Color:Glossy FinishThe BAKFlip G2 tonneau cover is a smart investment when you need durable cargo protection without sacrificing full bed access. Its integrated buckle system allows you to drive with your cover folded, flipped up, or closed without covering the 3rd brake light. The G2’s frustration-free functionality features a dual-action tailgate seal to allow seamless tailgate closure with the cover open or closed. It also comes complete with dual drain tubes to divert water out of the truck bed, and full-perimeter seals allowing you to drive in the rain without the hassle of tying down tarps around your cargo. The G2 hard folding cover provides greater security over vinyl covers, giving you confidence while you’re away from your truck. Its patented, automatic latching panel system enables efficient cargo protection when you close the cover and lock the tailgate. The BAKFlip G2 also lays flush to the truck bed for a no-profile appearance, allowing you to maintain the seamless appearance of your truck while still holding up to 300 lbs. of evenly distributed weight. Backed by a 2-year, hassle-free warranty, the G2 is proudly made in the USA with a US-based support team.
feature_bullets: 100% BED ACCESS: The low-profile BAKFlip G2 hard folding cover allows you to drive with the cover fully closed, folded, or flipped up without covering the 3rd brake light

ENHANCED SECURITY: This cover features durable aluminum panels and an automatic latching system, providing greater security over vinyl covers. The G2 is operational from either side of the truck bed with quick-release cables under the panels

ENHANCED FUNCTIONALITY: The G2’s prop rods hold the cover upright while open and they securely stow away when the cover is partially or fully closed. The dual-action tailgate seal allows you to close the tailgate with the cover open or closed

WE’VE GOT YOUR BAK: Make your purchase with confidence. The BAKFlip G2 tonneau cover is weight rated up to 300 lbs., is easy to install, and has a 3-year, hassle-free warranty. The G2 is proudly made in the USA with a US-based support team

specifications.Cover Included: Bakflip G2 15-19 Ford F150 6 Ft 6 In Bed
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars640 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
